name: genteelness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being very polite and showing knowledge of social rules in a way that is thought to be typical of people from a high social class: She has a quality of genteelness that is very unlike her husband. There is a common misconception about the genteelness of Boston — this is not a genteel city; this is a tough city. Related word
genteel
More examplesFewer examplesTheir home seemed to evoke a bygone era of genteelness and craftsmanship.The genteelness of his upbringing had not prepared him for such rough, rude behaviour.
